price: ߊ ߟ ߙ  ߟߍߙߊ ߟߝߊߙߌ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߢߌ߲߬ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߐ߬ߛߊ߬ߙߌ߬ ߘߐߞߣߍߣߍ߲
arabic: الٓرۚ تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ وَقُرۡءَانٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alif-lam-ra til'ka āyātu al-kitābi waqur'ānin mubīnin
